content: “AeroFarms’ modest effect on the surrounding area is still germinating.” *sigh* Well played, Alyssa. Great look at food culture and production in the 21st century. As a former chef, who has followed everything from farms to tables for as long as I can remember, the important reminder in all the news about the intersection of farming and technology is the same as it was a century ago: It doesn’t matter how healthy or tasty our food is if we can’t afford to eat it.
